channel.title: F# Functional App Development, using declarative dynamic UI on
channel.description: Recent content in F# Functional App Development, using declarative dynamic UI on

item.description: Reasonable goals of v2 # Due to the complex nature of GUI framework development, Fabulous v2 represents a substantial amount of work. In order to manage and optimize the time of everyone involved, more reasonable goals are required to get a version 2 out as fast as possible. Doing a complete redesign of the architecture + adding .NET 6 / MAUI support at the same time feels really discouraging. That’s why this version 2 will be done in 4 separate releases:
Fabulous v2 # Goals of v2 Using nightly builds Architecture - Virtualized collections
